title: Weird
body: so i logged in to my account as always and went to go hit play but it was grayed out saying Unavailable right now please restart client and check again, so i did but it was still grayed out and said the same thing, but after waiting like 10 minutes it let me play, anybody knows why it did that?

replies.body: It sounds like something with your network is blocking you from accessing the matchmaking service specifically.  To help troubleshoot, run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear these blocks.  I also recommend downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help auto-configure firewall settings.  Give your pc a reboot, and let me know if all that helps.
Thanks, the HRT seemed to help
